text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump @HHS_ASH Weak men and poor leaders shift the blame and admit no responsibility for their actions. You are the weakest in history. Standing on a tiny platform of self-worth when knowing no one likes you. #weak #WorstPresidentInHistory #COVID19 #IdiotInChief #TrumpLiesPeopleDie
